sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './buttons.css' import {useSpring, config,animated } from 'react-spring' export const ButtonPopRight = ({grow, contract,children}) => { const [textWidth,setTextWidth] = useSpring(()=>({width:"0vw",opacity:0})) const [tranform,setTranform] = useSpring(()=>({width:"12.131", x:"56.383"})) const [tranformBack,setTranformBack] = useSpring(()=>({width:"13.173", x:"55.877"})) const [tranformSVG,setTranformSVG] = useSpring(()=>({width:`${grow.radius}vw`, height:`${grow.radius}vw`})) const shrink = () => { setTranform({width:"12.131", x:"56.383"}) setTranformBack({width:"13.173", x:"55.877"}) setTranformSVG({width:`${grow.radius}vw`, height:`${grow.radius}vw`}) setTextWidth({width:"0vw",opacity:0}) } const expand = () => { setTranform({width:`${grow.front}`, x:`${grow.transReact}`}) setTranformBack({width:`${grow.front}`, x:`${grow.transReact}`}) setTranformSVG({width:`${grow.SVG}vw`, height:`${grow.radius}vw`}) setTextWidth({width:`${grow.textWidth}vw`,opacity:1}) } contract ? shrink() : expand() return (
{grow.text} {children}
); };
